env.name: GH_HOSTNAME
env.description: GH_HOSTNAME is required for some online audits

env.name: GH_TOKEN
env.description: GH_TOKEN is required for some online audits. Takes precedence over GITHUB_TOKEN

env.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
env.description: GITHUB_TOKEN is set automatically by GitHub Actions

env.name: SONAR_REGION
env.description: Can be used to switch to the US-based SonarCloud instance.

env.name: CODECOV_TOKEN
env.description: The Codecov token to use for uploading the report.
